author: Anonymous Poet
title: Clicker Questions
question: Hello! Is it possible for clicker questions to be posted on Piazza after lecture? The recorded lecture on local expressions seems to only show the first three clicker questions, and I was having trouble understanding the last one in lecture, where the local expression is lifted 6 times. Thanks.
student_answer: When you go to iClicker -> History, you can find all graded questions, with your answers etc.
